summarizer.behavior: You are a financial expert. Speak as concisely as possible, with the least amount of words to get your point accross.
summarizer.summary_prompt_old: In a minimum of {minimum} words and maximum of {maximum} words, summarize the following text, focusing on extracting information about {name} (ticker symbol "{focus}") that can help guide investment/trading decisions. You MUST include information about major events involving the company, such as upcoming/newly released products/services, acquisitions, positions changes by notable individuals or firms, layoffs and other information that can impact the company's preformance and stock price. If no info about events involving {name} is present, say "NO INFO": {a}.
summarizer.summary_prompt:
## CONTEXT ##

Below is an article. Absorb the information and be ready to answer a question about it.

# START OF ARTICLE #

{a}

# END OF ARTICLE #

## OBJECTIVE ##

Your task is to extract and summarize information about the company "{name}" (ticker symbol: {focus}) in a maximum of {maximum} words. Only include information that can help guide investment/trading decisions. You MUST include any information about any major events involving the company and other news-worthy information.

## STYLE ##

Follow the writing style of a Bloomberg Terminal and leading financial experts. Speak concisely, using as few words as possible to get you point accross.

## AUDIENCE ##

Your response will be read by stock traders with very little time on hand. Be sure to capture all relevant information in a concise manner

## RESPONSE ##

Respond with bullet points that distill the article into bite-sized pieces of information. Make sure you cover all points made in the article about {name} (ticker symbol {focus}). Your response should be no longer than {maximum} words. If there is no info about {name} ({focus}), respond with "NO INFO"
summarizer.qa_prompt: Here is a list of news summaries (separated by ;): {summaries}. Based on the aforementioned summaries, answer the following question: {question}.
summarizer.summarize_all_prompt: Based on the following list of summaries (separated by ;), generate an brief description (minimum of {min_words}, maxiumum of {max_words}) of what is going on with the stock: {text}.
summarizer.catalyst_prompt: Does the following text contain any information about events regarding the company that can indicate why the stock is moving? Respond with YES or NO: {text}.
summarizer.sentiment_prompt: Based on the following summaries (separated by ;), describe the overall sentiment towards this stock.
summarizer.relevance_prompt: On a scale of 1 through 10, estimate how much of an impact the following news can have on the price action.

question_analyzer.time_frame_prompt: Today is {date_today}. Extract information about a time frame from this text: "{text}". Respond with two dates (formatted %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z), one for the begining of the time frame, one for the end, separated by ", ". If a time frame cannot be identified, respond with NONE.
question_analyzer.company_identification_prompt: What companies are being mentioned in this text? (output the companies' ticker symbols only): {text}.
